title: Whiskeytown National Recreation Area: Work With Us
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Work With Us            Work With Us       For all the currently available jobs at Whiskeytown, go to http://jobsearch.usajobs.opm.gov/ and type in Whiskeytown . Other National Park Service and federal jobs are also available through this website.This website will provide you with all the information you should need, however, if you are having difficulty, or have further questions that are not addressed you may call Whiskeytown's personnel office at 530-242-3403. We will be glad to help you in any way that we can.Rudy Maich Human Resources SpecialistApplication Forms: OF-612 Application (Word 97) OF-612 Continuation form for additional jobs (Word 97) OF-612 Application(PDF)Equal Employment Opportunity The National Park Service offers an equal opportunity for all qualified applicants to be selected for jobs at all levels. We take seriously our goal to provide equal consideration regardless of race, religion, color, national origin, sex, physical handicap, age, political affiliation, or any other nonmerit factor. We encourage all interested and qualified persons to apply for positions with the National Park Service. We heartily believe that our emphasis on employment opportunity yields benefits for the agency, its employees, and its visitors.
